item.title: Partly Figured Out Make Npcs Talk On 508 out loud
item.dc:creator: @tomzyy11 tomzyy11
item.description:
@tomzyy11 wrote:

alright so while looking through my npc.java I found thisâ€¦

/**
 * Request text for this NPC.
 * @param message The message to make the NPC say.
 */
public void requestText(String message) {
    speakText = message;
    animUpdateReq = true;
    speakTextUpdateReq = true;

Also,

/**
 * If the NPC should speak.
 */
public boolean speakTextUpdateReq = false;
public String speakText = "";

Anyone got any ideas?
would be greatly appreciated
